thread.title: New Business Development Manager for Kuoni travel business
thread.title_full: New Business Development Manager for Kuoni travel business

author: eTN Editor
title: New Business Development Manager for Kuoni travel business
text:
New Business Development Manager for Kuoni travel business Adv: Aimie Johnson Adv: 
Kuoni Group Travel Experts has appointed a new Business Development Manager for North Americaâ€™s west coast as its group travel business out of the region rises once again. Based in Denver, Colorado, this position will be responsible for developing group travel business for the Kuoni Group Travel Experts and Travel Bound brands.
